title: The hype is REAL! - Audeze Maxwell Ultraviolet
description: Check out Wicked Cushions at: AMAZON:  WC WEBSITE:   We got a lot of comments asking us to check out the new Audeze Maxwell headphones, and when we saw the crazy ultraviolet colourway, we knew that was the one to get. With excellent compatibility, a ton of versatility, and this unique look, are these the new default gaming headphones to buy? Adam is here to find out.  Buy an Audeze Maxwell Ultraviolet Edition:  Buy an Audeze Maxwell:  Buy an Audeze Maxell (Sony Edition):    Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 By popular demand 0:49 Unboxing and design impressions 2:05 Buttons, battery life, and earcups 4:33 Sponsor - Wicked Cushions 4:57 Fit and finish 5:28 Unique connection options 6:42 Software 7:33 Audio impressions 8:14 LABS testing results 10:07 Microphone and noise suppression tests 11:30 Gaming impressions and overall thoughts 12:50 Outro
